}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device appears to be OEM [[Cameo]]. :{{WiFiCert|WFA7504|06/15/2009}} *[http://www.undeadly.org/cgi?action=article&sid=20101216231634 Support for Realtek 802.11n USB devices]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:DWA-131 RevA RevB Dlink Adapters.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
==See also== [[D-Link]] [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/Wireless/dwa130_revE/Drivers/dwa130_revE_drivers_510.zip 5.10 Drivers]. These support the following devices: *[[D-Link DWA-130 rev C2]] - 07d1:3302 (USB\VID_07D1&PID_3302) *[[D-Link DWA-130 rev E1]] - 07d1:3300 (USB\VID_07D1&PID_3300) *'''D-Link DWA-131 rev A1''' - 07d1:3303 (USB\VID_07D1&PID_3303
[[Category:English Documentation]]
